page.title: 20HOUSING/TYPES/VALUE/DEMAND.
page.content: The attitudes of people in Lytham towards their area is generally complimentary.Transport services are considered expensive but good.As far as the younger generation is concerned there is virtually nothing for them to do.The leisure activities for the older generation are considerably more numerous. The majority of houses in Lytham are pre-l920 and are considered desirable properties.The most common houses in Lytham are Victorian terraces.The more modern houses being true bungalows, large houses and flats.House prices in Lytham range from Â£l6,000 to Â£l20,000. At present Lytham is expanding with more people moving into the Community than leaving.However,there is little if any room for development since the completion of the South Park Estate commenced in l970.
